page.title: 16WHEATHAMPSTEAD LIFE-STYLES
page.content: On 22/5/85 Carla, Mark and I went down to the village.My mum Mrs.Smith took us down there.I went into the shoe shop and asked the lady that worked there some questions.Afterward Carla asked the lady in the hairdressers some questions she had made up.When she had finished we went out of the shop and Mark interviewed people in the village.Then Mark asked ten people questions about Wheathampstead.After that we all walked back to school to have our dinner.After our dinner we had to write about what happened down the village and then we drew some pictures of the view in Wheathampstead village.Then we typed it out onto the computer. While we were in the village we asked people a variety of questions about fashion and what they wore.
